title: Can I fix this?
body: Hi i was wondering if this is fixable. I think my account got hacked but i can still log in and everything but it keeps sending random rp links to my friends and I went to change my password and I saw that the email was changed it was not my email and i tried to change it back but it was not working is there a way to fix this please help me.

replies.body:
We can assist you in recovering your account if you submit a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide as much info as you can. I'd also recommend changing the password for your email address that was previously associated with your account for extra security.

Let me know if you have any questions.
